description:
Trees in front, rear and side gardens subject to LBI TPO 2000.  Works: 

 T1      Prunus - no action T2      Apple  - no action T3      Hawthorn  - no action T4      Sycamore (multi-stemmed) - crown thin 35% deadwood T5      Self-sown Sycamore - fell T6      Large Sycamore - crown lift to three metres, thin by         35%-40%, cut back from building to allow 2.5 metre         clearance, deadwood. T7      Self-sown Sycamore - fell T8      Tree of Heaven - Fell T9      Hawthorn - crown lift three metres, to clear head         height, deadwood. T10     Sycamore - crown lift three metres, crown thin 35%-         40%, cut back to allow clearance of three metres         from building, deadwood. T11     Sycamore - crown thin 35%/40%, cut back to allow         clearance of three metre from building line,         deadwood. T12     Sycamore - crown thin 35%/40%, cut back to allow         clearance of three metres from building, deadwood. T13     Chestnut - fell (severely decayed). T14     Sycamore - crown thin 35%/40%, cut back to allow         clearance of three metres from building, deadwood. T15     Mountain Ash - crown lift three metres, light crown         thin 20%, deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
